meanings.definition: A well in which a long, narrow tube is driven into the ground to access water.
meanings.sent1: The tubewells in the village provide clean water for everyone.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on tubewells to irrigate their fields during dry seasons.
meanings.sent3: The tubewells whispered secrets to each other underground.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a deep tubewell of memories, each one waiting to be drawn up.
meanings.sent5: The tubewells hummed softly as they brought forth life-giving water.
